Package imusim :: Package io :: Module bvh

Module bvh

source code

Reading and writing BVH body model movement files.

Classes
  BVHLoader
Loader class for BVH files.
  BVHExporter
Exporter class to write BVH files.

Function Details

loadBVHFile(filename, conversionFactor=1)

source code 

Load sampled body model data from a BVH file.

Parameters:
  • filename - Name of file to load.
  • conversionFactor - Scale factor to apply to position values, e.g. to convert meters to centimeters use conversionFactor=100.
Returns:
A SampledBodyModel object.

saveBVHFile(model, filename, samplePeriod, conversionFactor=1)

source code 

Save a body model data to a BVH file.

Parameters:
  • model - Body model to save.
  • filename - Name of file to write to.
  • samplePeriod - The time between frames in the BVH output.
  • conversionFactor - Scale factor to apply to position values, e.g. to convert meters to centimeters use conversionFactor=100.
